TopicTitle: Help with universal crew tube cores and kerbalism

Articles.Content:
Hey I am new to KSP and found the above mods, kerbalism is not working with crew tube cores and is venting my crew spaces connected to the cores with crew tubes as if the kerbal used the hatches instead of the tubes. Maybe kerbalism thinks the tubes are hatches idk, if anyone can point me in the right direction if this has been solved already thanks! I have been looking for like 3 days now and can't find the posts.

 

Oh I am using the 1.6 version in steam and have CKAN verified compatibility. 

Edited April 29, 2019 by Isidro22
